title: What are different ways life on earth smell? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many different ways, as the organ for smell varies a lot. But there is also large differences between closely related organisms as to how well they can smell. E.g. mouse has a much better smell sense than humans. That is the main reason mouse have more genes than humans.

Well, my stepdad smells like beer, my sister smells like shit and perfume mixed together, my mum smells alright, my dad smells like burned steak, and Eastern Europeans smell like all these mixed together.
